mapper.select: select b.board_free_no,b.board_title,b.board_regdate,b.board_readcount, b.board_groupno,b.board_groupseq,b.board_titletab,m.member_nicname from board b,member m where board_category="F" and b.member_id = m.member_id
select b.board_title,b.board_content,m.member_nicname form board b, member m where board_category="F" and b.member_id = m.member_id and board_free_no = #{board_free_no}
